ideas.title: Regional Market Focus: Hong Kong (Hang Seng)
ideas.rationale: The Hong Kong (Hang Seng) market has shown strong performance with a 11.06% return over the past week, outperforming other major markets. Consider increasing exposure to this region.

ideas.title: S&P 500 Tech Sector Momentum
ideas.rationale: The technology sector within the S&P 500 is showing strong momentum with leading stocks like AAPL and MSFT driving gains. Technical indicators suggest continued upward movement.

ideas.title: Strong Financial Stock: GS
ideas.rationale: GS has shown strong performance in the Financial sector with a 7.94% return. Technical indicators are supportive with RSI at 37.8.

ideas.title: NASDAQ Growth Stock: NVDA
ideas.rationale: NVDA continues to outperform the broader NASDAQ index with strong growth metrics. AI and data center demand remains robust, supporting further upside.

ideas.title: Alternative Data Pick: MSFT
ideas.rationale: MSFT shows positive signals based on alternative data analysis. Insider buying detected with 19 recent purchases. Recent earnings beat expectations by 1.79%.

ideas.title: Insider Activity: MSFT
ideas.rationale: Strong insider buying detected in MSFT with 19 purchases versus 6 sales over the past 3 months. Insider buying often signals management's confidence in future prospects.

data_sources.Stock Data: Alpha Vantage, Twelve Data, and Finnhub APIs
